availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married V. Boulden. Father of Henry Boulden, Nannie Boulden, Fannie Boulden, Charles Boulden, and Carrie Boulden.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, District 2, p. 263. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, District 1, p. 65. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, Millersburg Precinct, p. 1.
